short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Butterfly Wallpaper turn new tab to custom HD Butterfly background. Butterfly wallpaper background theme for fans.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Extension Features:

1. Automatically shuffle Butterfly wallpapers each time you open a new tab.  
2. Randomize Butterfly backgrounds or mark your favorites via the wallpaper selection panel.  
3. Integrated Google-powered search bar.  
4. Convenient access to your emails and social media accounts.  
5. Automatically display the current date and time.  
6. Create and manage tasks with a built-in notes feature.  
7. Quick links to your most visited websites.  
8. Easy access to your saved bookmarks.  
9. Add websites to a shortcut panel for fast navigation.  
10. One-click access to Google apps.  
11. Explore and apply more themes effortlessly.  
12. Share directly to social media with ease.  
13. Download wallpapers quickly with a single click.  
14. Enjoy instant access to play games.  
15. Enable fun animations like snow, rain, falling leaves, or fireworks in your Butterfly new tab.
